name: uce-template
description: A tiny toolless library with tools included

scripts.build: npm run graph && npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && drop-babel-typeof index.js && npm run min && npm run integrity && npm run size
scripts.integrity: cat min.js | openssl dgst -sha256 -binary | openssl base64 -A > nonce.txt && node -e 'const {readFileSync,writeFileSync}=require(`fs`),nonce=readFileSync(`nonce.txt`);writeFileSync(`README.md`,readFileSync(`README.md`).toString().replace(/(integrity)="[^"]*?"/g,`$1="sha256-${nonce}"`).replace(/(__nonce__ )`[^`]*?`/g,"$1`"+nonce+"`"))'
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.size: echo 'JS';echo "  gzip   $(cat min.js | gzip | wc -c)" && echo "  brotli $(cat min.js | brotli | wc -c)" && echo 'ES';echo "  gzip   $(cat es.js | gzip | wc -c)" && echo "  brotli $(cat es.js | brotli | wc -c)"

author: Andrea Giammarchi
